risk_factors: Commodity margin pressures and forced liquidations
Earnings guidance cuts cascading across sectors
Credit stability concerns if real estate weakness accelerates
Options expiry volatility and whipsaw intraday swings
Geopolitical escalation or peace resolution creating sudden safe-haven flows
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: Testing $700 call wall (active hedging zone); hold above $670 support (active). QQQ: Resistance $625-$630 (both active); watch hold above $620 near max pain. Watch for whipsaw into option expiry as margin pressures and volatility compression create intraday noise.
analysis.swing_levels: SPY 1-5 day: Bias toward $686 max pain with downside risk toward $670 support, then $645 (dormant put wall activates if breached). QQQ: $621 max pain is gravitational; below that, $585 put wall becomes key support zone. Resistance capped near $630-$640. Expect choppy range with defensive sector leadership; structural strength insufficient to sustain rallies above active call walls.

regime.label: NEUTRAL
regime.summary: Market is lacking clear direction. Wait for confirmation.

action.summary: NEUTRAL: No clear edge. Cash is a position.
